cyclone.name: MATTHEW
cyclone.current_location: about 35 miles ENE of Daytona Beach, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: continuing north-northwest, then north along the northeast Florida and Georgia coasts, and near or over the South Carolina coast before turning seaward
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: coast of South Carolina (near Charleston area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: North of Surf City NC to Cape Lookout NC (Hurricane Watch)
weather_observation.warning_coast: Cocoa Beach FL to Surf City NC (Hurricane Warning); Sebastian Inlet FL to Cocoa Beach FL and north of Surf City NC to Duck NC including the Pamlico and Albemarle Sounds (Tropical Storm Warning)
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northeast Florida, Georgia, South Carolina and North Carolina coasts
weather_observation.expected_closest_date_to_port: Already passed (storm moved north of Puerto Rico several days earlier)
weather_observation.closest_wind_data_location: Not listed (San Juan, PR not in wind-probability table)
